io.netty.util.concurrent

Interface FutureFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Channel, ChannelHandlerContext, io.netty.channel.ChannelPropertyAccess, DatagramChannel, EventExecutor, EventLoop, SctpChannel, SctpServerChannel, ServerChannel, ServerSocketChannel, SocketChannel, UdtChannel, UdtServerChannel
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAioChannel, AbstractChannel, AbstractEmbeddedChannel, AbstractEventExecutor, AbstractNioByteChannel, AbstractNioChannel, AbstractNioMessageChannel, AbstractOioByteChannel, AbstractOioChannel, AbstractOioMessageChannel, AbstractServerChannel, AioServerSocketChannel, AioSocketChannel, EmbeddedByteChannel, EmbeddedMessageChannel, ImmediateEventExecutor, LocalChannel, LocalServerChannel, NioDatagramChannel, NioEventLoop, NioSctpChannel, NioSctpServerChannel, NioServerSocketChannel, NioSocketChannel, NioUdtAcceptorChannel, NioUdtByteAcceptorChannel, NioUdtByteConnectorChannel, NioUdtByteRendezvousChannel, NioUdtMessageAcceptorChannel, NioUdtMessageConnectorChannel, NioUdtMessageRendezvousChannel, OioByteStreamChannel, OioDatagramChannel, OioSctpChannel, OioSctpServerChannel, OioServerSocketChannel, OioSocketChannel, RxtxChannel, SingleThreadEventExecutor, SingleThreadEventLoop, ThreadPerChannelEventLoop

    public interface FutureFactory
    Allows to create Future's on demand.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future newFailedFuture(Throwable cause)
      Create a new Future which is marked as fakued already.
      Promise newPromise()
      Return a new Promise.
      Future newSucceededFuture()
      Create a new Future which is marked as successes already.

    • Method Detail

      • newPromise

        Promise newPromise()
        Return a new Promise.

      • newSucceededFuture

        Future newSucceededFuture()
        Create a new Future which is marked as successes already. So Future.isSuccess() will return true. All FutureListener added to it will be notified directly. Also every call of blocking methods will just return without blocking.

      • newFailedFuture

        Future newFailedFuture(Throwable cause)
        Create a new Future which is marked as fakued already. So Future.isSuccess() will return false. All FutureListener added to it will be notified directly. Also every call of blocking methods will just return without blocking.
